string-array.item: benson
benson benson

string-array.name: wolfram_no_find
string-array.item: I couldn\'t find an answer to that.
Sorry, I couldn\'t find anything online for that.
I couldn\'t seem to find an answer to that.
There\'s nothing on the internet about that.

string-array.name: wolfram_bad_query
string-array.item: The doesn\'t seem like a valid question.
That\'s not something I can look up.
Sorry, I wasn\'t able to look that up.
I\'m not sure what you mean by that.
I wasn\'t able to look that up.

string-array.name: component_on_default
string-array.item: Turning the component on sir.
Right away sir.
Sure thing sir.

string-array.name: component_off_default
string-array.item: Turning the component off sir.
Right away sir.
Sure thing sir.

string-array.name: component_default
string-array.item: What would you like me to do with the component sir?
What do you like me to do with the component sir?

string-array.name: hello_default
string-array.item: Hello, how are you?
Hello, how are you today sir?
Greetings, how are you today?
Greetings, how are you?
Hi, how are you?
Hi, how are you sir?

string-array.name: hello_positive_status
string-array.item: Glad to hear it sir.
Good to hear.
I\'m glad sir.
Fantastic.

string-array.name: hello_negative_status
string-array.item: Sorry to hear that sir. Would a joke lighten the mood?
Sorry to hear that sir. Would a joke cheer you up?
Oh. Would a joke lighten the mood?
Oh. Would a joke cheer you up?

string-array.name: hello_no_joke
string-array.item: Okay then. I\'ll be here if you change your mind.
I\'ll be here if you change your mind.
Okay then.

string-array.name: how_are_you_default
string-array.item: I\'m well. How are you?
I\'m well today, how about you?
I\'m well. How are you today?

string-array.name: how_are_you_positive_status
string-array.item: Glad to hear it sir.
Good to hear.
I\'m glad sir.
Fantastic.

string-array.name: how_are_you_negative_status
string-array.item: Sorry to hear that sir. Would a joke lighten the mood?
Sorry to hear that sir. Would a joke cheer you up?
Oh. Would a joke lighten the mood?
Oh. Would a joke cheer you up?

string-array.name: how_are_you_no_joke
string-array.item: Okay then. I\'ll be here if you change your mind.
I\'ll be here if you change your mind.
Okay then.

string-array.name: joke_default
string-array.item: The C language combines all the power of assembly language with all the ease-of-use of assembly language.
Linux is user friendly. It\'s just very particular about who its friends are.
There are 10 types of people in this world. Those who understand binary, and those who don\'t.
There\'s a band called 1023 megabytes. They don\'t have any gigs yet.
My software doesn\'t have any bugs. It just develops random features.
My attitude isn\’t bad. It’s in beta.

string-array.name: time_default
string-array.item: It\'s %1s.
Right now it is %1s.
It is %1s.
It is currently %1s.
